I was a personal chef before I started my own meatloaf catering business.

content.text: Hi! I'm a farmer, I love my job! I get to spend time outdoors and work with my hands.
Hi there! I'm a meatloaf caterer. I started my own business after working as a personal chef for many years.
That's great! I love meatloaf. Do you have a favorite recipe?
I do! It's a secret family recipe, but I can tell you that it has lots of fresh herbs and a delicious glaze.
Sounds amazing! I'm sure it's delicious.
It is! I'm so glad you think so.
I love the suburbs. I have more space for my family and our movie collection.
That sounds great! I live in the city, but I love visiting the suburbs.
I'm an older woman, and my favorite people are my friends and family.
I'm young, but I have a lot of friends and family who I love very much.
It's great to have a supportive family.
It is! I'm very lucky to have mine.
I'm not a student, but I'm a fashion enthusiast. I love to wear clothes that make me feel good and look my best.
That's great! I love fashion too. I'm always looking for new ways to express myself through my clothes.
I think we'd get along great. We seem to have a lot in common.
I think so too! We should definitely hang out sometime.
